content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green
@year VARCHAR(4) ,
@month VARCHAR(2)
AS
BEGIN

    DECLARE @create_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX);
    DECLARE @drop_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX);
    
    SET @create_sql_stmt =
        N'CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.trip_data_green_'+@year+'_'+@month+'
            WITH(
                    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src
                    ,LOCATION = ''gold/trip_data_green/year='+@year + '/month='+@month+'''
                    ,FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format,
            )
            AS
            SELECT 
                td.year
                ,td.month
                ,tz.borough
                ,CONVERT(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime) AS trip_date
                ,cal.day_name AS trip_day
                ,iif(cal.day_name IN (''Saturday'',''Sunday''),''Y'',''N'') AS trip_day_weekend_ind
                ,SUM(iif(pt.description = ''Credit card'',1,0)) AS card_trip_count
                ,SUM(iif(pt.description = ''Cash'',1,0)) AS cash_trip_count
            FROM silver.vw_trip_data_green td
            INNER JOIN silver.taxi_zone tz ON (td.pu_location_id = tz.loation_id)
            INNER JOIN silver.calendar cal ON (cal.date = CONVERT(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime))
            INNER JOIN silver.payment_type pt ON (td.payment_type = pt.payment_type)
            WHERE td.year ='''+@year +'''
            AND td.month='''+@month+'''
            
            GROUP BY td.year
                    ,td.month
                    ,tz.borough
                    ,CONVERT(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime) 
                    ,cal.day_name';

    PRINT  @create_sql_stmt 

    EXEC (@create_sql_stmt)

    SET @drop_sql_stmt = 
        N'DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.trip_data_green_'+@year+'_'+@month ;

    EXEC (@drop_sql_stmt )
    PRINT  @drop_sql_stmt 

END
